extendedInfo.description: Welcome amigo. Under the master tutelage of the legendary Esteban Ortega you will fly your tortilla chip through the Mexican sky into the jar of dip. Sounds simple? No senor. Along the way you must collect the nuggets of gold and avoid deadly enemies such as mosquitoes furiosos, grande Mezcal worms, sleeping banditos and the feared Chupacabra. The Dip Desperado game is easy to learn but hard to master, and is not for the weak of mind or the slow of finger. You must fight with great might once the chip is in flight.By playing the game, you are also in with a chance to win 1 of 1000 amazing prizes being given away every day; there are XBOXs, track days at Silverstone and holidays to Florida to be won. Simply buy a bag of Doritos - or a jar of Doritos Dip if you want to double your chances of winning â and enter your unique code in the 'Enter Prize Draw' section. Those who post the top 3 scores each week are guaranteed a prize â so get flicking to start winning!
